name: Dimension Of Gameth
description: Turn-Based RPG board-Game where you can bring varius of hero into your squad to fighting together against opponent.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 7 Processor: 2 GHz 64-bit CPU or Higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Video RAM or Higher DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
